title: My account is dispeared!? wtf
body:
One of my ID is disappeared about 5 days ago when I had to close my client because of lag. When I tried to log back in it says my account ID or Passward is not right ( BUT I KNOW IT IS RIGHT). I can also find my account on na.op.gg. (MY ID IS MACADAMIA1). I know it is not banned because I know if it was banned ID they will tell me on the log in screen when I tried to log in. Does anyone know about this situation?

and YES CAPS LOCK WAS OFF .

replies.body: I've edited out your account information from your post for security reasons.  As a first step, make sure that your patcher is set to the correct region.  If you're still having any issues reaching your account, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll get back to you.  You may be asked some questions to verify your information, so I recommend grabbing our [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) guide to prep.  We'll reply back as soon as we can.
